name: Margarita
description: Bright, tart, and salty with a clean tequila backbone.
recipe: Tequila, lime juice, orange liqueur, simple syrup; shake with ice; salt rim optional.
zero_proof_swap: Zero-proof tequila (or omit) + lime + orange syrup; shake; salt rim.

name: Tommy's Margarita
description: A cleaner margarita that lets agave and tequila shine.
recipe: Tequila, lime juice, agave syrup; shake with ice; serve over fresh ice.
zero_proof_swap: Agave + lime + sparkling water; pinch of salt; shake then top.

name: Paloma
description: Bubbly grapefruit-citrus refresher that’s easy to sip.
recipe: Tequila, grapefruit soda, lime wedge; build over ice; pinch of salt optional.
zero_proof_swap: Grapefruit soda + lime + pinch of salt; build over ice.

name: Mojito
description: Minty, limey, and sparkling—cooling and crowd-pleasing.
recipe: White rum, lime, mint, sugar; muddle; top with soda; build over ice.
zero_proof_swap: Mint, lime, sugar; top with soda; build over ice.

name: Daiquiri
description: Simple and crisp—rum, lime, and sugar in perfect balance.

zero_proof_swap: Lime + simple; shake; strain; optional few drops rum extract.

name: Caipirinha
